order_id.description: Order UUID for which to filter returns. Optional for system-wide or global searches.

customer_id.description: Customer UUID if filtering returns by specific customer; supports compliance/audit and role-based searches. Optional.

shopping_mall_ai_product_id.description: Filter for reviews of a specific product. This must match the product's UUID from shopping_mall_ai_products id.

shopping_mall_ai_customer_id.description: Filter for reviews authored by a specific customer. Must match shopping_mall_ai_customers id.

rating.description: Optional filter for a specific review rating value (e.g., 1-5).

visible.description: Optional filter to restrict visible (i.e., published) reviews only.

reported.description: Optional filter for reviews that have been reported for moderation/investigation.

created_at_start.description: Start date for filtering reviews created after this timestamp (inclusive).

created_at_end.description: End date for filtering reviews created before this timestamp (inclusive).

query.description: Full-text or keyword search term to match in title or body of reviews.

limit.description: Maximum number of results per page (default 20, max 100).

Sort field for results. May be 'created_at' (default) or 'rating'.

sort_by.description: Sort field for results. May be 'created_at' (default) or 'rating'.

oneOf.description: Sort direction for sort_by field.
Sort direction for sort_by field.

IShoppingMallAiAdministrator.IUpdate,[ob.description: Request query for advanced filtering, searching, and paginating attachments. Includes criteria for uploader, domain, retention policy, and date range. Used for administrator and compliance workflows to search all attachment metadata for audit, evidence, or operational review.

search.description: Fuzzy search keyword for filename, business_domain, or uploader. Applied to text-searchable fields.

created_after.description: Return attachments created after this ISO 8601 timestamp (inclusive).

created_before.description: Return attachments created before this ISO 8601 timestamp (exclusive).

oneOf.description: Filter for deleted (soft-deleted) attachments. If true, only soft-deleted are returned; if false, only active; null for all.
Filter for deleted (soft-deleted) attachments. If true, only soft-deleted are returned; if false, only active; null for all.

deleted.description: Filter for deleted (soft-deleted) attachments. If true, only soft-deleted are returned; if false, only active; null for all.

business_domain.description: Restrict attachment search to a specific business context ('product_image', 'invoice', etc).

uploaded_by_id.description: User ID of the uploader (administrator, customer, or seller).

mime_type.description: Return only attachments matching this MIME type (e.g., 'image/jpeg', 'application/pdf').

legal_hold.description: Filter attachments under legal hold (true) or not under legal hold (false).

retention_policy_code.description: Search for attachments with a specific retention policy code.

oneOf.description: Sort direction for results: 'asc' for oldest first, 'desc' for most recent first.
Sort direction for results: 'asc' for oldest first, 'desc' for most recent first.

order.description: Sort direction for results: 'asc' for oldest first, 'desc' for most recent first.

Field to sort results by.

Redemption result status (e.g., 'success', 'failed', 'reversed', or 'abuse_suspected'). Only certain updates allowed after creation.

status.description: Redemption result status (e.g., 'success', 'failed', 'reversed', or 'abuse_suspected'). Only certain updates allowed after creation.

Discount value for this event (float), if corrected for audit. Null to leave unchanged.

discount_amount.description: Discount value for this event (float), if corrected for audit. Null to leave unchanged.

IShoppingMallAiCouponRedemptionLog.ICrea.description: Updatable fields for a coupon redemption log entry—status, event time, notes, discount.

id.description: Unique identifier for the coupon entity as set in the database. Required for traceability and audit; referenced across discounting and campaign systems.

oneOf.description: Foreign key referencing the parent discount campaign if the coupon is part of a campaign. Nullable for single/special-issue coupons.
Foreign key referencing the parent discount campaign if the coupon is part of a campaign. Nullable for single/special-issue coupons.

shopping_mall_ai_discount_campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the parent discount campaign if the coupon is part of a campaign. Nullable for single/special-issue coupons.

oneOf.description: Seller's unique identifier if this coupon is seller-issued. Null for platform or administrator coupons.
Seller's unique identifier if this coupon is seller-issued. Null for platform or administrator coupons.

shopping_mall_ai_seller_id.description: Seller's unique identifier if this coupon is seller-issued. Null for platform or administrator coupons.

oneOf.description: Administrator's unique ID if coupon is issued by platform admin. Nullable for seller coupons.
Administrator's unique ID if coupon is issued by platform admin. Nullable for seller coupons.

shopping_mall_ai_administrator_id.description: Administrator's unique ID if coupon is issued by platform admin. Nullable for seller coupons.

code.description: Coupon code entered at redemption time. Business-unique; validates scope and business logic. Case-sensitive and must be unique across all coupons.

title.description: Display title for the coupon, shown to users in UI or during business/seller configuration.

oneOf.description: Optional long-form description of coupon benefits, restrictions, or business context.
Optional long-form description of coupon benefits, restrictions, or business context.

description.description: Optional long-form description of coupon benefits, restrictions, or business context.

type.description: Type of coupon. Supports values such as 'fixed', 'percent', 'free_shipping', per business logic. Drives calculation and application methods.

scope.description: Scope of coupon—defines applicability, e.g., 'product', 'cart', 'category'. Drives eligibility logic when applying coupon in cart/checkout flow.

status.description: Current lifecycle status: 'issued', 'active', 'suspended', 'expired', 'redeemed', 'revoked', 'deleted'. Drives eligibility and enforcement in the platform.

issued_quantity.description: Total number of coupons issued (for campaign/analytics). Business-required for quota checks.

issued_per_user_quota.description: Limit per unique user for quota enforcement (e.g., 1 per user per campaign). Used for eligibility control and abuse prevention.

redeemed_quantity.description: Count of all redemptions for analytics, quota and fraud logic.

oneOf.description: If set, this limits the maximum discount granted for this coupon, regardless of type.
If set, this limits the maximum discount granted for this coupon, regardless of type.

max_discount_amount.description: If set, this limits the maximum discount granted for this coupon, regardless of type.

oneOf.description: Minimum cart/order total required to be eligible for coupon redemption. Null for un-constrained coupons.
Minimum cart/order total required to be eligible for coupon redemption. Null for un-constrained coupons.

minimum_purchase_amount.description: Minimum cart/order total required to be eligible for coupon redemption. Null for un-constrained coupons.

start_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the coupon becomes redeemable. Drives business window and eligibility checks.

end_at.description: Timestamp after which this coupon can no longer be redeemed. Drives eligibility and audit logic. Must be after start_at.

stackable.description: Indicates whether the coupon can be combined with others in single purchase/event. Critical for business logic on stacking policy.

created_at.description: Timestamp of coupon creation (for audit/compliance, rarely shown to end users).

updated_at.description: Timestamp of last coupon update. Used for audit, data integrity, and de-conflict logic.

oneOf.description: If set, marks coupon as soft deleted. Used for audit compliance; coupon with deleted_at != null is hidden from standard business flows.
If set, marks coupon as soft deleted. Used for audit compliance; coupon with deleted_at != null is hidden from standard business flows.

deleted_at.description: If set, marks coupon as soft deleted. Used for audit compliance; coupon with deleted_at != null is hidden from standard business flows.

Auditable and referenced in issuance/redemption logs, discount rules, and reporting.

Returns users registered after this UTC ISO date string, or null to omit lower boundary.

Returns users with login before this UTC ISO date string, or omit for no upper boundary.

last_login_before.description: Returns users with login before this UTC ISO date string, or omit for no upper boundary.

oneOf.description: Field to sort results by. One of: 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'last_login_at'. Null for default.
Field to sort results by. One of: 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'last_login_at'. Null for default.

order_by.description: Field to sort results by. One of: 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'last_login_at'. Null for default.

oneOf.description: Order direction: 'asc' or 'desc'. Use with order_by.
Order direction: 'asc' or 'desc'. Use with order_by.
Order direction: 'asc' or 'desc'. Use with order_by.

order_dir.description: Order direction: 'asc' or 'desc'. Use with order_by.

Result page number (1-based). Default is 1 if null.

IShoppingMallAiConfiguration.IUpdate,[ob.description: Filter/search/pagination request object for shopping_mall_ai_customers. Only use fields that exist in the schema. Used by administrators to fetch a specific segment or audit list of customers.

moderator_administrator_id.description: Filter: Only include moderation logs performed by the specified administrator (moderator).

shopping_mall_ai_review_id.description: Filter: Only include moderation actions related to this review.

shopping_mall_ai_inquiry_id.description: Filter: Only include moderation logs for the specified inquiry.

shopping_mall_ai_comment_id.description: Filter: Only include moderation logs acting on a specific comment.

moderation_action.description: Filter: Only return logs of a specific moderation action (e.g., approve, reject, hide, sanction, escalate, resolve, etc.).

reason.description: Full-text filter on the rationale/explanation of the moderation log.

user_note.description: Filter: Only logs containing the specified user-facing note.

from_timestamp.description: Datetime range: Only logs occurring after this time.

to_timestamp.description: Datetime range: Only logs up to and including this time.

limit.description: Pagination parameter: maximum records per page.

IShoppingMallAiCommentSnapshot,[object O.description: Request structure for searching and filtering moderation logs/events. Supports advanced filtering on entity, actor, action, date range, rationale, or user note. Used by administrative dashboards and compliance auditors.

IShoppingMallAiInquiry.ICreate,[object O.description: Request body schema for editing/moderating an existing inquiry. Permits updating subject, body, status, and evidence indication, subject to business logic, moderation, and edit window policy. Refer to the requirements for field-level edit restrictions. Authors may only edit their own inquiries under allowable conditions. Moderation actions (such as status/visibility overrides) may be restricted to admin.

oneOf.description: Updated subject/title for the inquiry. Optional; nullable to indicate no change.
Updated subject/title for the inquiry. Optional; nullable to indicate no change.

subject.description: Updated subject/title for the inquiry. Optional; nullable to indicate no change.

oneOf.description: Updated content of the inquiry. Optional; nullable to indicate no change.
Updated content of the inquiry. Optional; nullable to indicate no change.

body.description: Updated content of the inquiry. Optional; nullable to indicate no change.

oneOf.description: Updated inquiry status. Permissible values: 'open', 'closed', 'escalated', etc. Enum constraint may apply in implementation.
Updated inquiry status. Permissible values: 'open', 'closed', 'escalated', etc. Enum constraint may apply in implementation.

status.description: Updated inquiry status. Permissible values: 'open', 'closed', 'escalated', etc. Enum constraint may apply in implementation.

oneOf.description: Whether evidence is/was attached. Null or omitted if unchanged.
Whether evidence is/was attached. Null or omitted if unchanged.

has_evidence.description: Whether evidence is/was attached. Null or omitted if unchanged.

id.description: Unique identifier of this AI price optimization record, referencing the shopping_mall_ai_ai_price_optimizations table.

shopping_mall_ai_product_id.description: Reference to the product that was optimized. Links to shopping_mall_ai_products.id.

optimization_type.description: Type and purpose of the price optimization (e.g., 'AI_suggestion', 'manual_intervention', 'campaign', 'regulatory_correction'). Only enumerated values relevant to the business domain are allowed.

oneOf.description: Channel/store/campaign context in which the optimization was performed, or null for global. Links to channels table if present.
Channel/store/campaign context in which the optimization was performed, or null for global. Links to channels table if present.

channel_id.description: Channel/store/campaign context in which the optimization was performed, or null for global. Links to channels table if present.

original_price.description: Product price prior to the optimization event (in prevailing platform currency).

suggested_price.description: The price recommended by the AI/model/campaign or operator for this event.

final_price.description: The price value that was actually applied to the product after the optimization event.

oneOf.description: Serialized JSON or text documenting business/regulatory/model rationale for the price change. May contain explanations from the AI, operator notes, or justifications for legal purposes.
Serialized JSON or text documenting business/regulatory/model rationale for the price change. May contain explanations from the AI, operator notes, or justifications for legal purposes.

decision_rationale.description: Serialized JSON or text documenting business/regulatory/model rationale for the price change. May contain explanations from the AI, operator notes, or justifications for legal purposes.

oneOf.description: Actor (userId, operator, or marker) who accepted or overrode the suggested price. May be null if fully automated.
Actor (userId, operator, or marker) who accepted or overrode the suggested price. May be null if fully automated.

accepted_by.description: Actor (userId, operator, or marker) who accepted or overrode the suggested price. May be null if fully automated.

oneOf.description: Observed event outcome (conversion uplift, inventory movement, complaint, rollback, etc.) when known and measurable.
Observed event outcome (conversion uplift, inventory movement, complaint, rollback, etc.) when known and measurable.

result_outcome.description: Observed event outcome (conversion uplift, inventory movement, complaint, rollback, etc.) when known and measurable.

created_at.description: Timestamp for when this price optimization event record was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp for when this price optimization event record was last updated.

IPageIShoppingMallAiAiPriceOptimization,.description: A price optimization event generated either by AI or manually, referencing a product and including AI/model/output/acceptance and business rationale. Each record tracks the original, suggested, and applied price, as well as rationale, acceptance context, and measured outcome for analytics, compliance, and business intelligence.
